What is (are) isolated Pierre Robin sequence ?,"Pierre Robin sequence is a set of abnormalities affecting the head and face, consisting of a small lower jaw (micrognathia), a tongue that is placed further back than normal (glossoptosis), and an opening in the roof of the mouth (a cleft palate). This condition is described as a ""sequence"" because one of its features, an underdeveloped lower jaw (mandible), sets off a seque
